content: symptom, headache, toothache, fever, flu, cold, unconscious, accident, arm broken, leg broken, stomachache, heart attack
critical symptoms such as unconscious, accident, arm broken, leg broken, stomachache, heart attack...etc
low symptoms such as headache, toothache, fever, flu, cold...etc
For low symptoms, patients should drink enough water, provide vitamin C and sleep well, they will recover soon
critical symptoms are urgent case, and usually lead to internal damges
low symptoms usually occur within sessional changes, and can be treated at home
For critical symptoms, Patients should go to nearby medical centre for technical checkup. Would recommand them to connect with XCare online doctors for advice

metadata.furtherContent: You can call XCare hotline: 1900 1234 for online consultation
